import React, { useContext } from "react"; import '../styles/utility-styles.css' import '../styles/text-styles.css' import { Col, Container, Row, Form, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import NavBar from "../components/NavBar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import ProfilePicture from '../assets/ProfilePicture.svg' import CloseButton from '../assets/CloseButton.svg' import IconProf from '../assets/IconProf.svg' import { updateUser } from "../http/userAPI"; import { Context } from ".."; const PersonalAccount = () => { const {user} = useContext(Context) const handleSaveChanges = async () => { const updatedUserData = { email: document.getElementById('formEmail').value, name: document.getElementById('formFirstName').value, surname: document.getElementById('formLastName').value, phone_num: document.getElementById('formPhone').value, }; try { const updatedUser = await updateUser(user.id, updatedUserData); setUser(updatedUser); } catch (error) { console.error('Ошибка при обновлении пользователя:', error); } }; return ( <>
